channel.title: Matt S - Steam Contests - Win prizes
channel.description: Want to win steam games? Join Steam Contests facebook page, its really amazing and easy to enter contests :) https://www.facebook.com/steamcontests?fref=nf and this is the current contest: https://www.humblebundle.com/

item.title: Matt S - Steam Contests - Win prizes
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So you’re giving away discounted games? Cool…
I mean, I could just go pay $12 and get all the games, but nooo. Let me waste time on your page to hopefully maybe win. When the prizes aren’t even worth the time…

You’re giving away humble bundles because you can’t afford to give away the full games constantly, aren’t ya?

Read full topic
item.source: Matt S - Steam Contests - Win prizes
